title: I restarted my Google Pixel earlier today and now none of the main apps will open. any ideas?
content:
I restarted my Pixel 3a earlier today and now apps won't stay open.   Any ideas?

I have tried deleted files and have device storage below 70%
I tried clearing cache and data on a few apps.
I even uninstalled one app and reinstalled - that app worked until i closed it and tried to re-open.

When I open an app it flashes open and then disappears.   It shows open but wont' actually load and stay on screen.

It seemed like initially after the restart only apps i had used today were affected but now any app I open does the same thing.

I have also check for and applied all available device and app updates.

Help please.
